evidence.text: IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that the plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction (ECF No. 28) is denied.

extracted.value: Denial of plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the plaintiffs’ motion for class certification (ECF No. 34) is denied.

extracted.value: Denial of plaintiffs’ motion for class certification.

evidence.text: IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that the defendants’ motion for summary judgment is granted.

extracted.value: Granting of defendants’ motion for summary judgment.

evidence.text: IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that, pursuant to 28 U.S.C. § 1915A(b), plaintiffs’ demands for compensatory and punitive damages are dismissed.

extracted.value: Dismissal of plaintiffs’ demand for compensatory and punitive damages.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the defendants shall answer or otherwise respond to the remainder of the complaint within 21 days of this order.

extracted.value: Ordering defendants to answer or respond within 21 days.

evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that the rule to show cause dated July 18, 2024, is DISCHARGED.

extracted.value: rule to show cause dated July 18, 2024, is discharged

evidence.text: This appeal is DISMISSED in accordance with Federal Rule of Appellate Procedure 42(b).
